page.title: 17School Log Book (cont)
page.content:
{21st. June 1940 }Many children were absent om the morning ofJune 20th. owing to the Air Raid warning during the night.
{28th. October 1940} School closed at noo today for the mid term holiday. The holiday commenced today instead of the 31st. October owing to the presence of a delayed action bomb 250 yards from the school premises.
{2nd. June 1943 }"Wings for Victory Week" June 26th to July 3rd. Amount taken for Savings Certificates Â£651. Stamps Â£27.7. Â£22.10 sent as a gift to the R.A.F. Benevolent Fund.
{22nd. November 1943 } A certificate of Honour was presented to the Infants Department this morning by a repatriated soldier.
